ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We rescued them and their people from their terrible plight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And saved them and their people from great distress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We delivered both of them and their people from the great calamity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and saved them and their people from great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And rescued them and their people from the great calamity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We saved them and their people from the great distress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We delivered them both and their people from the mighty distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We delivered them and their people from the great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And saved them and their people from the great distress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We saved them and their people from great distress;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And delivered them and their people from the great affliction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and delivered them and their people from their great distress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We delivered them and their people from (their) Great Calamity;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We saved them and their people from the great distress;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We saved them with their nation from a great distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We delivered them and their people from the terrible disaster.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:115] and We delivered them and their people, the Children of Israel, from the great distress, namely, Pharaoh’s enslavement of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And saved them and their people) who believed in them (from the great distress) from drowning,
